item.title: Certifications
item.description: Certifications eCPPTv2 eCPPTv2 (eLearnSecurity Certified Professional Penetration Tester) is an intermediate level certification that covers penetration testing methodologies and tools. The exam requires hands-on experience in performing penetration tests and includes a virtual penetration test to assess practical skills. Here is my eCPPTv2 Review. Check it if you are interested ! eWPT eWPT (eLearnSecurity Web application Penetration Tester) is an advanced level certification that covers web application penetration testing methodologies and techniques.
